#summary Downloads

= Downloads =

Google Code has recently deprecated adding new downloads. Downloads will be available from PyPI in the future.

  * [https://pypi.python.org/pypi/cutadapt/ cutadapt on PyPI]
  * [http://code.google.com/p/cutadapt/downloads/list?can=4 List of old downloads on Google Code]
  * You can of course also get the [https://github.com/marcelm/cutadapt most recent sources from Github] and compile them yourself.
